attributes.action: Introduce rationing for basic household essentials
attributes.additional_details: Government must act to prevent further panic and stabilise the situation. Mr Hancock referred to a wartime response being required. However with stocks in supermarkets and shops running low we pose the risk of missing the most basic elements.
attributes.background: In recent weeks and days, we have seen shops and suppliers out of stock of the most basic and essential goods. We call on the government to introduce rationing for essential goods as without this the most vunrunable will go without.
